message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good offer for you in the first round.
I think it's fairer to split the money more evenly. This is my offer, but I'm open to negotiation.
Bob, time is running out and the value is decreasing. I'll come down to $65, but that's my final offer.
I'm willing to split the money evenly.  Let's end this before the value drops further.
